999350.name: Epics Of Distant Realm: Director's Cut Edition
999350.description:
Nostalgia Redefined

Ready for some nostalgia? Epics of Distant Realm is an adventure game from 2006, combined with role-playing elements. Take control of a young man who has lost his memory upon crashing to a foreign world. Explore the island, clear dungeons, find loot, buy a farm and grow tomatoes. Your call.

Features:

  • Overhaul of backgrounds, while keeping the feel of the authentic look

  • Hero movement and animation is now realistic

  • Replacing arrow controls with the modern WASD scheme

  • Replacing map system with the new navigation screen

  • Introduction of hotkeys to make selections easier

  • Rebalancing of enemies corresponding to your level stats

  • Improved HUD and all the text

  • Improved dialogue with slightly better humor

  • Bug fixes

New Features:

New levels and interactions to explore

NEW GAME+ mode to increase replay value
999350.supported_languages:
英语*, 土耳其语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
